subject: URGENT: Address Correction Request - Order #SSN3755
description_text:
​Dear Customer Service Team,
​I hope this email finds you well.
​I am writing to request an urgent correction to the shipping address
provided for my recent order. Upon reviewing the details, I realized that I
unfortunately omitted the floor number and side of the apartment/unit
during the checkout process.
​The order details and the complete, corrected address are as follows:

Order Number #SSN3755
Purchase Date November 22nd, 2025
Street Address Av. Estados Unidos da América n°70
Missing Information 5º Direito (5th Floor, Right)
Postal Code 1700-178
City/Location Lisbon

Could you please confirm if you are able to update the shipping information
in your system to include "5º Direito (5th Floor, Right)" before the order
is dispatched? As the package has not yet been shipped, I trust this change
can still be made.
​Thank you very much for your prompt attention to this critical matter.
​Best regards,
​João Nogueira

conversations.body_text: Hi João Nogueira,    Please confirm this is correct  João Nogueira  Av. Estados Unidos da América n°70  5º Direito  1700-178 Lisbon  Lisbon District  Portugal  +351 915 238 884

​Dear Customer Service,​thank you for correcting the address for order
#SSN3755.

​I appreciate your quick help in adding the 5th Floor, Right detail.
​
Best regards, ​João Nogueira
